tool.name: Create GATK List
tool.description: For a particular directory, count the number of files, and compare to an input value.

param.name: input_cnt
param.label: Expected Count
param.help: Expected number of files in the directory. If this number of files exist, the workflow will continue.

param.name: base_dir
param.label: Directory
param.help: Count the number of files in this directory.

param.name: runid
param.label: Run ID
param.help: Run identifier used to create target directory.

tool.help: For a particular directory, count the number of files, and compare to an input value.
